body: A tankoubon with only 1 story involved? Might as well make a manga series out of it.
Hot damn, insta fav. Art and expression are so good. @poplar07 yeah, I was confused as well.

Understandable
for hentai standards, yes, a regular-sized penis is a small penis

It's weird because it is tagged as 'small penis'  and I was like h-hey that's not small at all... Right? Oh and I'm asking this not because I have the dick size of that dude, mine is bigger ofc hahahah...
Holy shit, it actually came out!  I've been waiting for this for over a year and I'm so happy it's out!

Most of the first 100 pages look terribly blurry despite the month old Japanese version being perfectly clean. If you're gonna put in the work of translating something, at least do it with decent base material. Though, I'm not in the business so feel free to let me know if I'm missing context.
Finally! After so fucking long... Thank you translation god🙏
